snippet: It is the latest loss for the company as it fights court decisions that could bring $18 billion in penalties.
abstract: Federal appeals court panel reaffirms its ruling that BP is liable for federal Clean Water Act damages from the 2010 Gulf of Mexico oil spill; is latest setback for company as it fights court decisions that could bring $18 billion in penalties.
lead_paragraph: It is the latest loss for the company as it fights court decisions that could bring $18 billion in penalties.

headline.main: BP Loses Latest Court Appeal on Liability for Gulf Oil Spill
headline.print_headline: BP Loses Latest Court Appeal on Liability for Gulf Oil Spill
